name: UNC Sleep Disorders Center
description: Provides care to patients who have a wide range of sleep-related disorders.

locations.address:
300 Meadowmont Village Circle,
Suite 202,
Chapel Hill,
NC 27517
locations.name: Neurology Clinic

registration_other: a physician will refer you to [one of their doctors](https://www.med.unc.edu/neurology/divisions/sleep-1/sleep-team/).  You may be able to ask about [their e-consult service](https://www.med.unc.edu/neurology/new-patient-referrals-1/adult-referrals/adult-neurology-e-consults/) at this point
booking_other: they will call you (usually within about 14-21 days), and will schedule an appointment if necessary
